data.title: Distributed Tracing with Jaeger
data.description: Design an event-driven autoscaling architecture using KEDA.

courses.title: About Task
courses.description: This competition will challenge you to design an architecture diagram that demonstrates how Jaeger can be used to trace requests across a complex microservices architecture. You'll learn how to instrument your code, how to collect and analyze trace data, and how to visualize and interpret the results.

courses.title: About Challenge
